title: so i just picked up Dark Souls 2: Scholar of the first sin
body:
it should be renamed to Artificial difficulty 2: Scholar of the first sin

all they did was add a shit ton more enemies in beginner areas and in weird places, give enemies insane targeting(as in i rolled out of the way midswing, and the enemy turned while attacking to still hit me)

good thing i pirate games and didn't waste $50 on this.

what is it with japan and re-releasing the same game over and over annually? they have to realize at some point that the reason japanese gaming is dying is because they release the same shit over and over.
